location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: Reports developments from Schiras [Shiraz] including news that Carim Caun [Karim Khan] is resigned to losing Bussora [Basra] to the Turks and seems resolved to leave it in ruins. An additional note on 25 March reports further news from Persia via the Bushire linguist.
